SIGMA Lab

Sydney IntelliGent MultimediA Laboratory
The University of Sydney

Object Detection

We are conducting inspiring researches in general object detection. Our team won the 1st place of ILSVRC 2016.

Pose Estimation

We have been focusing on pose estimation problem over years. Check our demo by a single click!

Person Re-Identification

We have been focusing on person re-id problem over years.
